Webinar

The Best Database for Integrating Data from Silos

MarkLogic is an operational and transactional Enterprise NoSQL database.

Solution Sheet

Secure Your Data

Protect data from cybersecurity threats using standards-based cryptography, advanced key management, and granular separation of duties.

Marketplace & Data Services Hub

HealthCare.gov provides access to health coverage for millions of Americans - integrating dozens of data sources and handling hundreds of thousands of concurrent users.

Call to Action ›

What Businesses Want

Organizations want a clear, up-to-date picture of their data so they can make informed business decisions. This means integrating data into a unified, actionable 360 view—whether it is a 360 view of customers, financial trading data, HR data, media content, or anything else.

Call to Action ›

Advanced Encryption

Protect data from cybersecurity threats using standards-based cryptography, advanced key management, and granular separation of duties.

Call to Action ›

Element Level Security

Hide specific parts of JSON and XML documents based on user roles, providing a granular level of control similar to "cell-level" security.

Call to Action ›
 

Redaction

Remove or replace specific data, such as social security numbers, in order to prevent leakage of sensitive data when exporting data for sharing.

Call to Action ›
